alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mason, northeastern Cabell and northwestern Putnam Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Buffalo, or 15 miles south of Gallipolis, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Leon, Southside, Grimms Landing, Fraziers Bottom and Ashton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
